Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Runnable, Remote
public class LobbyController extends Thread implements VirtualServer
Represents a controller in charge of controlling a single game instance, its players, the serialization of it, and the messages regarding it.

  • Nested Class Summary

      Serializes the current game into a file.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends any process tied to the model and deletes the save file in case of a successfully finished game.

    • getEndMatchTask

      private TimerTask getEndMatchTask(LobbyController controller)
      Returns a new TimerTask that ends the match after a set amount of time, used to automatically close a lobby when the server is left with only one player for too long.
      Parameters:
      controller - LobbyController Controller instance.

    • connect

      public void connect(ClientDescriptor client) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Connects a ClientDescriptor to the Lobby and notifies the ModelInstance if necessary.
      Parameters:
      client - ClientDescriptor Client being connected.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if the model refused the connection.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(ClientDescriptor client)
      Notifies the MainServerController of a ServerDisconnectMessage sent by the ClientDescriptor
      Parameters:
      client - ClientDescriptor Client being disconnected.

    • disconnectProcedure

      public void disconnectProcedure(ClientDescriptor client)
      Properly disconnects the ClientDescriptor from the Model and removes from the local listener list.
      Parameters:
      client - ClientDescriptor Client being disconnected.

    • getClientInfo

      public ClientGameListEntry getClientInfo()
      Generates and returns a GameListEntry object containing the lobby details.
      Returns:
      ClientGameListEntry Entry containing the lobby info.

    • ping

      public void ping(ClientDescriptor descriptor)
      Refreshes the timeout timer for a particular ClientDescriptor and restarts the timeout clock belonging to it.
      Parameters:
      descriptor - ClientDescriptor Client pinging the server
